analysis.description:
CryptoKittenToken.purchase (/unique_chucks/16/0xe41a1f73979cb25def133fb3a529d540057188f2.sol#293-338) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- oldOwner.transfer(sellingPrice.sub(contractCut)) (/unique_chucks/16/0xe41a1f73979cb25def133fb3a529d540057188f2.sol#333-334)
CryptoKittenToken._isContract (/unique_chucks/16/0xe41a1f73979cb25def133fb3a529d540057188f2.sol#463-470) is declared view but contains assembly code

ERC721 (/unique_chucks/16/0xe41a1f73979cb25def133fb3a529d540057188f2.sol#87-141) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-approve (/unique_chucks/16/0xe41a1f73979cb25def133fb3a529d540057188f2.sol#111)
	-transferFrom (/unique_chucks/16/0xe41a1f73979cb25def133fb3a529d540057188f2.sol#120-121)
	-transfer (/unique_chucks/16/0xe41a1f73979cb25def133fb3a529d540057188f2.sol#127-130)

CryptoKittenToken (/unique_chucks/16/0xe41a1f73979cb25def133fb3a529d540057188f2.sol#154-470) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-approve (/unique_chucks/16/0xe41a1f73979cb25def133fb3a529d540057188f2.sol#383-390)
	-transferFrom (/unique_chucks/16/0xe41a1f73979cb25def133fb3a529d540057188f2.sol#390-398)
	-transfer (/unique_chucks/16/0xe41a1f73979cb25def133fb3a529d540057188f2.sol#398-408)

CryptoKittenToken._isContract uses assembly (/unique_chucks/16/0xe41a1f73979cb25def133fb3a529d540057188f2.sol#463-470)
	- /unique_chucks/16/0xe41a1f73979cb25def133fb3a529d540057188f2.sol#466-469
